comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Another Bain spelling variant. He's at BoxRec as Johnny Marto, and his cigarette card displayed on that page I linked to sports a colorized version of this Bain photo. According to the Johnny Marto page at VintageCardPrices.com, this photo appeared on cards issued in 1910. Two versions of it on three cards can be seen by clicking on the "photo" links on that page. Born in New York City in 1885, the Lightweight fought 112 known bouts in a career spanning the years 1903 to 1922.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for catching the spelling variant. We'll add it to the source data and reload the description.
